mapper.select: SELECT FreeComment.boardName,FreeComment.content,FreeComment.regDate, FreeComment.freeBoardId id FROM lsedb.FreeComment where FreeComment.memberId = #{param1} union select RequestComment.boardName,RequestComment.content,RequestComment.regDate, RequestComment.requestBoardId id From lsedb.RequestComment where RequestComment.memberId =#{param1} union select SiteComment.boardName,SiteComment.content,SiteComment.regDate, SiteComment.siteBoardId id From lsedb.SiteComment where SiteComment.memberId=#{param1} order by regDate desc;
